useEffect(()=>{if(!from||!to){setFiltered([]);return;}const fDate=new Date(from);const tDate=new Date(to);tDate.setHours(23,59,59,999);setFiltered(results.filter(r=>{const d=new Date(r.createdAt);return d>=fDate&&d<=tDate;}));},[results,from,to]);// 3) Selección automática del primer día

function computeMetrics(result,allResults){const slots=result.timeSlots||[];const acts=slots.flatMap(s=>(s.activities||[]).map(a=>({...a,slot:s.slot})));const total=acts.reduce((s,a)=>s+a.duration,0)||1;// Distribución %
